title: Disability to exist at accrual of action
context: §657-14 Disability to exist at accrual of action. No person shall avail oneself of any disability enumerated in this part, unless the disability existed at the time the right of action accrued. [CC 1859, §1046; RL 1925, §2649; RL 1935, §3920; RL 1945, §10431; RL 1955, §241-13; HRS §657-14; am L 1972, c 105, §1(g); gen ch 1985] Case Notes Cited: 29 H. 579, 586 (1927).
